participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and loyal, with a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. i am in the army.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Introverted and innovative, often lost in her own world of creativity.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
